```{=typst}
== $beta_x$

$ beta_x =  sum_(i=1)^8 N_i B_(x_i) $
$ B_(x_1) = beta_x_1 = - w_(,x_1) = theta_y_1 $
$ B_(x_2) = beta_x_2 = - w_(,x_2) = theta_y_2 $
$ B_(x_3) = beta_x_3 = - w_(,x_3) = theta_y_3 $
$ B_(x_4) = beta_x_4 = - w_(,x_4) = theta_y_4 $ \
\
$ B_(x_5) = beta_x_5 = C_5 beta_n_5 - S_5 beta_s_5 = C_5 beta_n_5 + S_5 w_(,s_5) $
$ B_(x_6) = beta_x_6 = C_6 beta_n_6 - S_6 beta_s_6 = C_6 beta_n_6 + S_6 w_(,s_6) $
$ B_(x_7) = beta_x_7 = C_7 beta_n_7 - S_7 beta_s_7 = C_7 beta_n_7 + S_7 w_(,s_7) $
$ B_(x_8) = beta_x_8 = C_8 beta_n_8 - S_8 beta_s_8 = C_8 beta_n_8 + S_8 w_(,s_8) $
\
wenn $k = 5$ dann $i = 1$ und $j=2$\
wenn $k = 6$ dann $i = 2$ und $j=3$\
wenn $k = 7$ dann $i = 3$ und $j=4$\
wenn $k = 8$ dann $i = 4$ und $j=1$\
mit:\
$ C_5 beta_n_5 = 1/2 C_5 (beta_n_1 + beta_n_2) = -1/2 C_5 (w_(,n_1) + w_(,n_2)) = -1/2 C_5 (S_5 theta_x_1 - C_5 theta_y_1 + S_5 theta_x_2 - C_5 theta_y_2) $
$ C_6 beta_n_6 = 1/2 C_6 (beta_n_2 + beta_n_3) = -1/2 C_6 (w_(,n_2) + w_(,n_3)) = -1/2 C_6 (S_6 theta_x_2 - C_6 theta_y_2 + S_6 theta_x_3 - C_6 theta_y_3) $
$ C_7 beta_n_7 = 1/2 C_7 (beta_n_3 + beta_n_4) = -1/2 C_7 (w_(,n_3) + w_(,n_4)) = -1/2 C_7 (S_7 theta_x_3 - C_7 theta_y_3 + S_7 theta_x_4 - C_7 theta_y_4) $
$ C_8 beta_n_8 = 1/2 C_8 (beta_n_4 + beta_n_1) = -1/2 C_8 (w_(,n_4) + w_(,n_1)) = -1/2 C_8 (S_8 theta_x_4 - C_8 theta_y_4 + S_8 theta_x_1 - C_8 theta_y_1) $
\
#pagebreak()
und:
$ S_5 w_(,s_5) = -S_5 (3/(2 l_(12)) (w_1 - w_2) + 1/4 (w_(,s_1) + w_(,s_2))) \
#h(1cm)        = -S_5 (3/(2 l_(12)) (w_1 - w_2) + 1/4 (beta_(s_1) + beta_(s_2))) \
#h(5cm)        = -S_5 (3/(2 l_(12)) (w_1 - w_2) + 1/4 ((C_5 theta_x_1 + S_5 theta_y_1 + C_5 theta_x_2 + S_5 theta_y_2))) $
$ S_6 w_(,s_6) = -S_6 (3/(2 l_(23)) (w_2 - w_3) + 1/4 (w_(,s_2) + w_(,s_3))) \
#h(1cm)        = -S_6 (3/(2 l_(23)) (w_2 - w_3) + 1/4 (beta_(s_2) + beta_(s_3))) \
#h(5cm)        = -S_6 (3/(2 l_(23)) (w_2 - w_3) + 1/4 ((C_6 theta_x_2 + S_6 theta_y_2 + C_6 theta_x_3 + S_6 theta_y_3))) $
$ S_7 w_(,s_7) = -S_7 (3/(2 l_(34)) (w_3 - w_4) + 1/4 (w_(,s_3) + w_(,s_4))) \
#h(1cm)        = -S_7 (3/(2 l_(34)) (w_3 - w_4) + 1/4 (beta_(s_3) + beta_(s_4))) \
#h(5cm)        = -S_7 (3/(2 l_(34)) (w_3 - w_4) + 1/4 ((C_7 theta_x_3 + S_7 theta_y_3 + C_7 theta_x_4 + S_7 theta_y_4))) $
$ S_8 w_(,s_8) = -S_8 (3/(2 l_(41)) (w_4 - w_1) + 1/4 (w_(,s_4) + w_(,s_1))) \
#h(1cm)        = -S_8 (3/(2 l_(41)) (w_4 - w_1) + 1/4 (beta_(s_4) + beta_(s_1))) \
#h(5cm)        = -S_8 (3/(2 l_(41)) (w_4 - w_1) + 1/4 ((C_8 theta_x_4 + S_8 theta_y_4 + C_8 theta_x_1 + S_8 theta_y_1))) $
#pagebreak()
=== Zusammenfassung 
$ B_(x_1) = theta_y_1 $
$ B_(x_2) = theta_y_2 $
$ B_(x_3) = theta_y_3 $
$ B_(x_4) = theta_y_4 $
$ B_(x_5) = -1/2 C_5 (S_5 theta_x_1 - C_5 theta_y_1 + S_5 theta_x_2 - C_5 theta_y_2) - S_5 (3/(2 l_(12)) (w_1 - w_2) + 1/4 (C_5 theta_x_1 + S_5 theta_y_1 + C_5 theta_x_2 + S_5 theta_y_2)) $
$ B_(x_6) = -1/2 C_6 (S_6 theta_x_2 - C_6 theta_y_2 + S_6 theta_x_3 - C_6 theta_y_3) - S_6 (3/(2 l_(23)) (w_2 - w_3) + 1/4 (C_6 theta_x_2 + S_6 theta_y_2 + C_6 theta_x_3 + S_6 theta_y_3)) $
$ B_(x_7) = -1/2 C_7 (S_7 theta_x_3 - C_7 theta_y_3 + S_7 theta_x_4 - C_7 theta_y_4) - S_7 (3/(2 l_(34)) (w_3 - w_4) + 1/4 (C_7 theta_x_3 + S_7 theta_y_3 + C_7 theta_x_4 + S_7 theta_y_4)) $
$ B_(x_8) = -1/2 C_8 (S_8 theta_x_4 - C_8 theta_y_4 + S_8 theta_x_1 - C_8 theta_y_1) - S_8 (3/(2 l_(41)) (w_4 - w_1) + 1/4 (C_8 theta_x_4 + S_8 theta_y_4 + C_8 theta_x_1 + S_8 theta_y_1)) $
#pagebreak()

== $beta_y$

$ beta_y =  sum_(i=1)^8 N_i B_(y_i) $
$ B_(y_1) = beta_y_1 = - w_(,y_1) = - theta_x_1 $
$ B_(y_2) = beta_y_2 = - w_(,y_2) = - theta_x_2 $
$ B_(y_3) = beta_y_3 = - w_(,y_3) = - theta_x_3 $
$ B_(y_4) = beta_y_4 = - w_(,y_4) = - theta_x_4 $ \
\
$ B_(y_5) = beta_y_5 = S_5 beta_n_5 + C_5 beta_s_5 = S_5 beta_n_5 - C_5 w_(,s_5) $
$ B_(y_6) = beta_y_6 = S_6 beta_n_6 + C_6 beta_s_6 = S_6 beta_n_6 - C_6 w_(,s_6) $
$ B_(y_7) = beta_y_7 = S_7 beta_n_7 + C_7 beta_s_7 = S_7 beta_n_7 - C_7 w_(,s_7) $
$ B_(y_8) = beta_y_8 = S_8 beta_n_8 + C_8 beta_s_8 = S_8 beta_n_8 - C_8 w_(,s_8) $
\
wenn $k = 5$ dann $i = 1$ und $j=2$\
wenn $k = 6$ dann $i = 2$ und $j=3$\
wenn $k = 7$ dann $i = 3$ und $j=4$\
wenn $k = 8$ dann $i = 4$ und $j=1$\
mit:\
$ S_5 beta_n_5 = 1/2 S_5 (beta_n_1 + beta_n_2) = -1/2 S_5 (w_(,n_1) + w_(,n_2)) = -1/2 S_5 (S_5 theta_x_1 - C_5 theta_y_1 + S_5 theta_x_2 - C_5 theta_y_2) $
$ S_6 beta_n_6 = 1/2 S_6 (beta_n_2 + beta_n_3) = -1/2 S_6 (w_(,n_2) + w_(,n_3)) = -1/2 S_6 (S_6 theta_x_2 - C_6 theta_y_2 + S_6 theta_x_3 - C_6 theta_y_3) $
$ S_7 beta_n_7 = 1/2 S_7 (beta_n_3 + beta_n_4) = -1/2 S_7 (w_(,n_3) + w_(,n_4)) = -1/2 S_7 (S_7 theta_x_3 - C_7 theta_y_3 + S_7 theta_x_4 - C_7 theta_y_4) $
$ S_8 beta_n_8 = 1/2 S_8 (beta_n_4 + beta_n_1) = -1/2 S_8 (w_(,n_4) + w_(,n_1)) = -1/2 S_8 (S_8 theta_x_4 - C_8 theta_y_4 + S_8 theta_x_1 - C_8 theta_y_1) $
\
#pagebreak()
und:
$ C_5 w_(,s_5) = -C_5 (3/(2 l_(12)) (w_1 - w_2) + 1/4 (w_(,s_1) + w_(,s_2))) \
#h(1cm)        = -C_5 (3/(2 l_(12)) (w_1 - w_2) + 1/4 (beta_(s_1) + beta_(s_2))) \
#h(5cm)        = -C_5 (3/(2 l_(12)) (w_1 - w_2) + 1/4 ((C_5 theta_x_1 + S_5 theta_y_1 + C_5 theta_x_2 + S_5 theta_y_2))) $
$ C_6 w_(,s_6) = -C_6 (3/(2 l_(23)) (w_2 - w_3) + 1/4 (w_(,s_2) + w_(,s_3))) \
#h(1cm)        = -C_6 (3/(2 l_(23)) (w_2 - w_3) + 1/4 (beta_(s_2) + beta_(s_3))) \
#h(5cm)        = -C_6 (3/(2 l_(23)) (w_2 - w_3) + 1/4 ((C_6 theta_x_2 + S_6 theta_y_2 + C_6 theta_x_3 + S_6 theta_y_3))) $
$ C_7 w_(,s_7) = -C_7 (3/(2 l_(34)) (w_3 - w_4) + 1/4 (w_(,s_3) + w_(,s_4))) \
#h(1cm)        = -C_7 (3/(2 l_(34)) (w_3 - w_4) + 1/4 (beta_(s_3) + beta_(s_4))) \
#h(5cm)        = -C_7 (3/(2 l_(34)) (w_3 - w_4) + 1/4 ((C_7 theta_x_3 + S_7 theta_y_3 + C_7 theta_x_4 + S_7 theta_y_4))) $
$ C_8 w_(,s_8) = -C_8 (3/(2 l_(41)) (w_4 - w_1) + 1/4 (w_(,s_4) + w_(,s_1))) \
#h(1cm)        = -C_8 (3/(2 l_(41)) (w_4 - w_1) + 1/4 (beta_(s_4) + beta_(s_1))) \
#h(5cm)        = -C_8 (3/(2 l_(41)) (w_4 - w_1) + 1/4 ((C_8 theta_x_4 + S_8 theta_y_4 + C_8 theta_x_1 + S_8 theta_y_1))) $
#pagebreak()
=== Zusammenfassung 
$ B_(y_1) = - theta_x_1 $
$ B_(y_2) = - theta_x_2 $
$ B_(y_3) = - theta_x_3 $
$ B_(y_4) = - theta_x_4 $ 
$ B_(y_5) = -1/2 S_5 (S_5 theta_x_1 - C_5 theta_y_1 + S_5 theta_x_2 - C_5 theta_y_2) + C_5 (3/(2 l_(12)) (w_1 - w_2) + 1/4 (C_5 theta_x_1 + S_5 theta_y_1 + C_5 theta_x_2 + S_5 theta_y_2)) $
$ B_(y_6) = -1/2 S_6 (S_6 theta_x_2 - C_6 theta_y_2 + S_6 theta_x_3 - C_6 theta_y_3) + C_6 (3/(2 l_(23)) (w_2 - w_3) + 1/4 (C_6 theta_x_2 + S_6 theta_y_2 + C_6 theta_x_3 + S_6 theta_y_3)) $
$ B_(y_7) = -1/2 S_7 (S_7 theta_x_3 - C_7 theta_y_3 + S_7 theta_x_4 - C_7 theta_y_4) + C_7 (3/(2 l_(34)) (w_3 - w_4) + 1/4 (C_7 theta_x_3 + S_7 theta_y_3 + C_7 theta_x_4 + S_7 theta_y_4)) $
$ B_(y_8) = -1/2 S_8 (S_8 theta_x_4 - C_8 theta_y_4 + S_8 theta_x_1 - C_8 theta_y_1) + C_8 (3/(2 l_(41)) (w_4 - w_1) + 1/4 (C_8 theta_x_4 + S_8 theta_y_4 + C_8 theta_x_1 + S_8 theta_y_1)) $
#pagebreak()

$ beta_x =  sum_(i=1)^8 N_i B_(x_i) " und " beta_y =  sum_(i=1)^8 N_i B_(y_i) $

$beta_x$ und $beta_y$ kÃ¶nnen auch in der folgenden Matrixschreibweise ausgedrÃ¼ckt werden: 
$ beta_x =  H^x U_n " und " beta_y =  H^y U_n $
mit:\
$ H^x = mat(H_1^x,H_2^x,H_3^x,H_4^x,H_5^x,H_6^x,H_7^x,H_8^x,H_9^x,H_10^x,H_11^x,H_12^x) $
$ H^y = mat(H_1^y,H_2^y,H_3^y,H_4^y,H_5^y,H_6^y,H_7^y,H_8^y,H_9^y,H_10^y,H_11^y,H_12^y) $
und
$ U_n = vec(w_1,theta_x_1,theta_y_1,w_2,theta_x_2,theta_y_2,w_3,theta_x_3,theta_y_3,w_4,theta_x_4,theta_y_4) $

#grid(
  columns: 2,
  rows: 12,
  column-gutter: 100pt,
  row-gutter: 20pt,
[$beta_x =  H_1^x dot w_1$],        [$beta_y =  H_1^y dot w_1$],
[$#h(1cm) + H_2^x dot theta_x_1$],  [$#h(1cm) + H_2^y dot theta_x_1$],
[$#h(1cm) + H_3^x dot theta_y_1$],  [$#h(1cm) + H_3^y dot theta_y_1$],
[$#h(1cm) + H_4^x dot w_2$],        [$#h(1cm) + H_4^y dot w_2$],
[$#h(1cm) + H_5^x dot theta_x_2$],  [$#h(1cm) + H_5^y dot theta_x_2$],
[$#h(1cm) + H_6^x dot theta_y_2$],  [$#h(1cm) + H_6^y dot theta_y_2$],
[$#h(1cm) + H_7^x dot w_3$],        [$#h(1cm) + H_7^y dot w_3$],
[$#h(1cm) + H_8^x dot theta_x_3$],  [$#h(1cm) + H_8^y dot theta_x_3$],
[$#h(1cm) + H_9^x dot theta_y_3$],  [$#h(1cm) + H_9^y dot theta_y_3$],
[$#h(1cm) + H_10^x dot w_4$],       [$#h(1cm) + H_10^y dot w_4$],
[$#h(1cm) + H_11^x dot theta_x_4$], [$#h(1cm) + H_11^y dot theta_x_4$],
[$#h(1cm) + H_12^x dot theta_y_4$], [$#h(1cm) + H_12^y dot theta_y_4$])

#grid(
  columns: 4,
  rows: 12,
  column-gutter: 30pt,
  row-gutter: 20pt,
[$H_1^x =$],[$3/2 (N_5 a_5 - N_8 a_8)$],  [$H_1^y =$],[$3/2 (N_5 d_5 - N_8 d_8)$],
[$H_2^x =$],[$N_5 b_5 + N_8 b_8$],        [$H_2^y =$],[$-N_1 + N_5 e_5 + N_8 e_8$],
[$H_3^x =$],[$N_1 - N_5 c_5 - N_8 c_8$],  [$H_3^y =$],[$-N_5 b_5 - N_8 b_8$],

[$H_4^x =$],[$3/2 (N_6 a_6 - N_5 a_5)$],  [$H_4^y =$],[$3/2 (N_6 d_6 - N_5 d_5)$],
[$H_5^x =$],[$N_6 b_6 + N_5 b_5$],        [$H_5^y =$],[$-N_2 + N_6 e_6 + N_5 e_5$],
[$H_6^x =$],[$N_2 - N_6 c_6 - N_5 c_5$],  [$H_6^y =$],[$-N_6 b_6 - N_5 b_5$],

[$H_7^x =$],[$3/2 (N_7 a_7 - N_6 a_6)$],  [$H_7^y =$],[$3/2 (N_7 d_7 - N_6 d_6)$],
[$H_8^x =$],[$N_7 b_7 + N_6 b_6$],        [$H_8^y =$],[$-N_3 + N_7 e_7 + N_6 e_6$],
[$H_9^x =$],[$N_3 - N_7 c_7 - N_6 c_6$],  [$H_9^y =$],[$-N_7 b_7 - N_6 b_6$],

[$H_10^x =$],[$3/2 (N_8 a_8 - N_7 a_7)$], [$H_10^y =$],[$3/2 (N_8 d_8 - N_7 d_7)$],
[$H_11^x =$],[$N_8 b_8 + N_7 b_7$],       [$H_11^y =$],[$-N_4 + N_8 e_8 + N_7 e_7$],
[$H_12^x =$],[$N_4 - N_8 c_8 - N_7 c_7$], [$H_12^y =$],[$-N_8 b_8 - N_7 b_7$])
\
\
mit:

$   a_k = -(x_(i j))/(l_(i j)^2) = -S_k/l_(i j) \
    b_k = 3/4 (x_(i j) y_(i j))/(l_(i j)^2) = -3/4 C_k S_k \
    c_k = (1/4 x_(i j)^2 - 1/2 y_(i j)^2)/(l_(i j)^2) = 1/4 S_k^2  -1/2 C_k^2 \
    d_k = -(y_(i j))/(l_(i j)^2) = C_k/l_(i j) \
    e_k = (-1/2 x_(i j)^2 + 1/4 y_(i j)^2)/(l_(i j)^2) = -1/2 S_k^2 + 1/4 C_k^2 $
#pagebreak()

Basisfunktionen $N_i$

Die Basisfunktionen basieren auf dem Serendipity-Element mit 8 Knoten. Einen Knoten an jeder Ecker und einem Knoten jeweils in der Mitte einer jeden Seite.

$ N_i (xi, eta) #h(3cm) " mit " i = 1...8 $

$xi$ und $eta$ sind parametrische Koordinaten, das bedeutet ...
```
